altername_name: Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble 2
name: Rainbow Islands
overview: The basic premise of the game is that each level is an island which is slowly sinking into the sea. The player must therefore get to the top of each level, by jumping on platforms and making use of the game's most distinctive feature: the ability to produce solid rainbows, which are used both as platforms to stand on, and as a weapon.
